org.sd.match
Class OsobAligner

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.match.OsobAligner

public class OsobAligner
extends java.lang.Object

Class to encapsulate processes and structures to align input with an osob for scoring.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Constructor Detail

public OsobAligner()
Create an instance of an osob aligner.

NOTE: an instance is NOT thread-safe. Each thread must obtain a new instance!

Method Detail

align

public AlignmentResult align(Osob osob,
                             InputWrapper inputWrapper,
                             int extraWordPenalty)
Align the input with the match concept.

The strategy here is to be as tight and fast as possible in finding the best alignment of the input to the match object. Once the best alignment is found, detailed alignment information for an explanation, etc. can be (re-)extracted. The goal is to minimize object creation, etc.

It is assumed that the match concept terms have been sorted within each variant and that the tree has been built fully expanded such that all combinatorics have already been applied.

isSubset

public final boolean isSubset(Osob subOsob,
                              Osob supOsob)
